item.title: Hugo: Static site building
item.description: Starting the server $ hugo server -D Building the public html pages folder: First delete the already existing public folder, then run this command: $ hugo -D uploading to github.com First add the updated work into local git $ git add . $ git commit -m 'some comment' Now run the command to upload to github $ git push -u origin master The above will ask you your username and password.
